title: Complementary and Alternative Therapies for Alzheimer's... : Alzheimer's Care Today
author: Author Information
cleaned_text: Sandra K. Pope, PhD, MPH, is assistant professor in the departments of geriatrics and epidemiology at University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences and at the Clinton School for Public Service, Little Rock, Arkansas. M.T. Horne, BA, is research assistant in the Department of Geriatrics, College of Medicine, University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences, Little Rock, Arkansas. M.C. Morris, ScD, is a nutritional epidemiologist and associate professor at the Rush Institute for Healthy Aging, Rush University Medical Center, Chicago, Illinois. M. Sano, MD, is director of the Alzheimer's Disease Center at Mount Sinai School of Medicine, New York, New York. Lisa P. Gwyther, MSW, is education director at the Bryan Alzheimer's Disease Research Center at Duke University Medical Center and associate clinical professor in the Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences at Duke University. N.E. Lombardo, PhD, is senior research scientist at the Alzheimer's Disease Center and adjunct research assistant professor in the Department of Neurology at Boston University School of Medicine, Boston, Massachusetts. C. Beck, PhD, is Professor in the departments of geriatrics and psychiatry, College of Medicine and professor in the College of Nursing at the University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences, Little Rock. S.T. DeKosky, MD, is director of the University of Pittsburgh Alzheimer's Disease Center and professor and chairman of the Department of Neurology, University of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Address correspondence to: Sandra K. Pope, PhD, MPH, Department of Geriatrics, University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences, 4301 West Markham St, Slot 808, Little Rock, AR 72205. E-mail: [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#a8dbc3d8c7d8cde8ddc9c5db86cdccdd). This work was supported by National Institutes of Health, National Institute of Aging, Alzheimer's Disease Centers grant P30AG019606 (Drs Beck and Pope) and grant K01AG20173 (Dr Pope).
